results.title: Metformin: Past, Present, and Future.
results.text_hl: Recent studies have explored additional benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovarian disease@@@, @DISEASE_Diabetes_Gestational @DISEASE_MESH:D016640 @@@gestational diabetes mellitus@@@, @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive disorders@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Immune_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007154 @@@immunological diseases@@@.

results.title: The Role and Mechanism of Metformin in the Treatment of Nervous System Diseases.
results.text_hl: These conditions, encompassing both @DISEASE_Peripheral_Nervous_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D010523 @@@central nervous system (CNS) and peripheral nervous system (PNS) disorders@@@, have substantial social and economic impacts. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@, a @CHEMICAL_Guanidine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019791 @@@guanidine@@@ derivative derived from a plant source, exhibits therapeutic properties in various health conditions such as @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@, aging, @<m>DISEASE_Immune_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007154 @@@immune-related disorders@@@, @DISEASE_Polycystic_Ovary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D011085 @@@polycystic ovary syndrome@@@, @DISEASE_Cardiovascular_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D002318 @@@cardiovascular ailments@@@, and more.

citations.NLM: Li H, Liu R, Liu J, Qu Y. The Role and Mechanism of Metformin in the Treatment of Nervous System Diseases. Biomolecules. 2024 Dec 10;14(12):. PMID: 39766286

results.title: Metformin reprograms tryptophan metabolism to stimulate CD8+ T cell function in colorectal cancer.
results.text_hl: Herein, using single-cell RNA sequencing, we showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ remodels the @<m>DISEASE_Immune_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007154 @@@immune@@@ landscape of @DISEASE_Colorectal_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D015179 @@@CRC@@@.

results.title: Preliminary Results for Personalized Therapy in Pregnant Women with Polycystic Ovary Syndrome During the COVID-19 Pandemic
results.text_hl: Due to present abnormalities, each @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ was administered @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. It is worth remembering the historical indications of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which has been used as an antiviral drug.

results.title: Metformin Clinical Trial in HPV+ and HPV- Head and Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma: Impact on Cancer Cell Apoptosis and Immune Infiltrate
results.text_hl: We report new findings on the impact of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on the @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Immune_System_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007154 @@@immune@@@ elements of the TME from a clinical trial of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @DISEASE_Squamous_Cell_Carcinoma_of_Head_and_Neck @DISEASE_MESH:D000077195 @@@HNSCC@@@.
